1/*

9
10#include <isl_pw_macro.h>
11
12#undef VAL
13#define VAL CAT(isl_,VAL_BASE)
14
15/* Add "v" to the constant term of "pw" over its entire definition domain.
16 */
17__isl_give PW *FN(FN(PW,add_constant),VAL_BASE)(__isl_take PW *pw,
18 __isl_take VAL *v)
19{
20 isl_bool zero;
21 isl_size n;
22 int i;
23
24 zero = FN(VAL,is_zero)(v);
25 n = FN(PW,n_piece)(pw);
26 if (zero < 0 || n < 0)
27 goto error;
28 if (zero || n == 0) {
29 FN(VAL,free)(v);
30 return pw;
31 }
32
33 for (i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
34 EL *el;
35
36 el = FN(PW,take_base_at)(pw, i);
37 el = FN(FN(EL,add_constant),VAL_BASE)(el, FN(VAL,copy)(v));
38 pw = FN(PW,restore_base_at)(pw, i, el);
39 }
40
41 FN(VAL,free)(v);
42 return pw;
43error:
44 FN(PW,free)(pw);
45 FN(VAL,free)(v);
46 return NULL;
47}
48
